thread.subject: New Year Rewards Program Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear Royal Crest Hotel Team,

Our company, 'RewardsPlus', is interested in partnering with The Royal Crest Hotel for our upcoming New Year Rewards Program. We're particularly interested in offering exclusive deals to your valued guests for stays in your Deluxe Suites and access to The Grand Ballroom for corporate events.  Could you please provide us with information on your potential interest and contact person for this collaboration?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
Sarah Chen
Marketing Manager
RewardsPlus

thread.subject: Re: New Year Rewards Program Inquiry
Re: Re: New Year Rewards Program Inquiry
thread.body:
Thank you for your prompt response.  Could you please clarify what "look into this" entails?  What are the next steps and who will be our point of contact for this inquiry? We're eager to discuss potential collaboration further.

Sincerely,
Sarah Chen
Marketing Manager
RewardsPlus

thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: New Year Rewards Program Inquiry
thread.body: I've forwarded your email to the relevant department.  They will be in touch soon.

thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: New Year Rewards Program Inquiry
thread.body:
Thank you.  Please let us know the expected timeframe for a response.  We appreciate your assistance.

Sincerely,
Sarah Chen
Marketing Manager
RewardsPlus
